text: Monster Garage is a video game based on the TV show of the same name developed by Invictus Games and released by Activision Value for Windows and Xbox in 2004. == Reception == Monster Garage received generally unfavorable reviews according to website Metacritic. https://www.metacritic.com/game/pc/monster- garage https://www.metacritic.com/game/xbox/monster-garage https://www.ign.com/articles/2004/02/26/monster-garage-review GameSpot panned it, saying that the "lack of any strategy to the gameplay, a generally poor design, and an endless number of stability problems turn Monster Garage into a real monster". GameZone says it might have some appeal for the fantasy of building vehicles, but "the time spent unscrewing bolts is disproportionately large compared to the time testing your creation".https://www.gamezone.com/gzreviews/r23346.htm == References == Category:2004 video games Category:Simulation video games Category:Racing video games Category:Activision games Category:Video games based on television series Category:Video games developed in Hungary Category:Video games set in the United States Category:Windows games Category:Xbox games
